verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had finished <S%G5055><s%> giving <S%G1299><s%> instructions <S%G1299><s%> to His twelve <S%G1427><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> He departed <S%G3327><s%> from there <S%G1564><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> and preach <S%G2784><s%> in their cities. <S%G4172><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> when John <S%G2491><s%> in prison <S%G1201><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of the works <S%G2041><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> he sent <S%G3992><s%> [word] by his disciples, <S%G3101><s%>
and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Are You the Expected <S%G2064><s%> One, or <S%G2228><s%> shall we look <S%G4328><s%> for someone <S%G2087><s%> else <S%G2087><s%>?"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Go <S%G4198><s%> and report <S%G518><s%> to John <S%G2491><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you hear <S%G191><s%> and see: <S%G991><s%>

[the] blind <S%G5185><s%> receive <S%G308><s%> sight <S%G308><s%> and [the] lame <S%G5560><s%> walk, <S%G4043><s%> [the] lepers <S%G3015><s%> are cleansed <S%G2511><s%> and [the] deaf <S%G2974><s%> hear, <S%G191><s%> and [the] dead <S%G3498><s%> are raised <S%G1453><s%> up, and [the] poor <S%G4434><s%> have the gospel <S%G2097><s%> preached <S%G2097><s%> to them.
" And blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he who <S%G3739><s%> keeps <S%G3361><s%> from stumbling <S%G4624><s%> over <S%G1722><s%> Me."

And as these <S%G3778><s%> were going <S%G4198><s%> [away,] Jesus <S%G2424><s%> began <S%G757><s%> to speak <S%G3004><s%> to the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> did you go <S%G1831><s%> out into the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> to look <S%G2300><s%> at? A reed <S%G2563><s%> shaken <S%G4531><s%> by the wind <S%G417><s%>?

"But what <S%G5101><s%> did you go <S%G1831><s%> out to see <S%G3708><s%>? A man <S%G444><s%> dressed <S%G294><s%> in soft <S%G3120><s%> [clothing]? Behold, <S%G2400><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who wear <S%G5409><s%> soft <S%G3120><s%> [clothing] are in kings' palaces. <S%G3624><s%>

"But why <S%G5101><s%> did you go <S%G1831><s%> out? To see <S%G3708><s%> a prophet <S%G4396><s%>? Yes, <S%G3483><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, and one who is more <S%G4053><s%> than a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

"This <S%G3778><s%> is the one about <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I send <S%G649><s%> My messenger <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> Your face, <S%G4383><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> will prepare <S%G2680><s%> Your way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> You.'

"Truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, among <S%G1722><s%> those born <S%G1084><s%> of women <S%G1135><s%> there has not arisen <S%G1453><s%> [anyone] greater <S%G3173><s%> than John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist; <S%G910><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> he who is least <S%G3398><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is greater <S%G3173><s%> than he.

"And from the days <S%G2250><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G910><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now <S%G737><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> suffers <S%G971><s%> violence, <S%G971><s%> and violent <S%G973><s%> men <S%G973><s%> take <S%G726><s%> it by force. <S%G726><s%>
"For all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> and the Law <S%G3551><s%> prophesied <S%G4395><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> John. <S%G2491><s%>
"And if <S%G1487><s%> you care <S%G2309><s%> to accept <S%G1209><s%> [it,] he himself <S%G846><s%> is Elijah, <S%G2243><s%> who was to come. <S%G2064><s%>
"He who has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

"But to what <S%G5101><s%> shall I compare <S%G3666><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%>? It is like <S%G3664><s%> children <S%G3813><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> in the market <S%G58><s%> places, <S%G58><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> call <S%G4377><s%> out to the other <S%G2087><s%> [children],
and say, <S%G3004><s%> 'We played <S%G832><s%> the flute <S%G832><s%> for you, and you did not dance; <S%G3738><s%> we sang <S%G2354><s%> a dirge, <S%G2354><s%> and you did not mourn. <S%G2875><s%>'

"For John <S%G2491><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> drinking, <S%G4095><s%> and they say, <S%G3004><s%> 'He has <S%G2192><s%> a demon! <S%G1140><s%>'

"The Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> and drinking, <S%G4095><s%> and they say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Behold, <S%G2400><s%> a gluttonous <S%G5314><s%> man <S%G444><s%> and a drunkard, <S%G3630><s%> a friend <S%G5384><s%> of tax-gatherers and sinners! <S%G268><s%>' Yet <S%G2532><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> is vindicated <S%G1344><s%> by her deeds. <S%G2041><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> He began <S%G757><s%> to reproach <S%G3679><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> most <S%G4183><s%> of His miracles <S%G1411><s%> were done, <S%G1096><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they did not repent. <S%G3340><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, Chorazin! <S%G5523><s%> Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, Bethsaida! <S%G966><s%> For if <S%G1487><s%> the miracles <S%G1411><s%> had occurred <S%G1096><s%> in Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon <S%G4605><s%> which occurred <S%G1096><s%> in you, they would have repented <S%G3340><s%> long <S%G3819><s%> ago <S%G3819><s%> in sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> and ashes. <S%G4700><s%>

"Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, it shall be more <S%G414><s%> tolerable <S%G414><s%> for Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon <S%G4605><s%> in [the] day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment, <S%G2920><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for you.

"And you, Capernaum, <S%G2746><s%> will not be exalted <S%G5312><s%> to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> will you? You shall descend <S%G2597><s%> to Hades; <S%G86><s%> for if <S%G1487><s%> the miracles <S%G1411><s%> had occurred <S%G1096><s%> in Sodom <S%G4670><s%> which occurred <S%G1096><s%> in you, it would have remained <S%G3306><s%> to this <S%G4594><s%> day. <S%G4594><s%>

"Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you that it shall be more <S%G414><s%> tolerable <S%G414><s%> for the land <S%G1093><s%> of Sodom <S%G4670><s%> in [the] day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment, <S%G2920><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for you."

At that time <S%G2540><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "I praise <S%G1843><s%> Thee, O Father, <S%G3962><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> and earth, <S%G1093><s%> that Thou didst hide <S%G2928><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> from [the] wise <S%G4680><s%> and intelligent <S%G4908><s%> and didst reveal <S%G601><s%> them to babes. <S%G3516><s%>
"Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> for thus <S%G3779><s%> it was well-pleasing in Thy sight. <S%G1715><s%>

"All <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> have been handed <S%G3860><s%> over <S%G3860><s%> to Me by My Father; <S%G3962><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1921><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> the Father; <S%G3962><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> does anyone <S%G5100><s%> know <S%G1921><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> and anyone to whom <S%G3739><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> wills <S%G1014><s%> to reveal <S%G601><s%> [Him.]
"Come <S%G1205><s%> to Me, all <S%G3956><s%> who are weary <S%G2872><s%> and heavy-laden, and I will give <S%G373><s%> you rest. <S%G373><s%>

"Take <S%G142><s%> My yoke <S%G2218><s%> upon you, and learn <S%G3129><s%> from Me, for I am <S%G1510><s%> gentle <S%G4239><s%> and humble <S%G5011><s%> in heart; <S%G2588><s%> and you shall find <S%G2147><s%> rest <S%G372><s%> for your souls. <S%G5590><s%>
"For My yoke <S%G2218><s%> is easy, <S%G5543><s%> and My load <S%G5413><s%> is light. <S%G1645><s%>"
